ygData.subject: error regarding mass-based properties in demo_ftnlib.cpp
ygData.msgSnippet: I found some errors in the definitions of mass-based properties in demo_ftnlib.cpp. They seem to have been copied and pasted from the mole-based property

From: "cool_and_breezy" <aszeri@...>
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=154046908
X-Yahoo-Profile: cool_and_breezy
X-eGroups-Approved-By: dggoodwin <dgoodwin@...> via web; 24 Jul 2003 00:03:57 -0000

I found some errors in the definitions of mass-based properties in
demo_ftnlib.cpp. They seem to have been copied and pasted from the
mole-based property routines in the same file, but incompletely
altered.

So, for example, 

    doublereal enthalpy_mass_() { 
        return _gas->enthalpy_mole();
    }

should be 

    doublereal enthalpy_mass_() { 
        return _gas->enthalpy_mass();
    }

Same is true for all the other mass-based properties. Also note the
error is printed in the documentation: f77.pdf.

Andrew Szeri, Professor
University of California at Berkeley
